name: B o u n c e (BlueTitan2617)
name_original: B o u n c e (BlueTitan2617)
description:
[NOTE: This game is highly unfinished, to the point where the song isn't even original yet. Check devlogs for more info.]

A game where you bounce around and fight some red things.

- A, D = movement

- W = jump

- Primary button = Let out your homunculi in the form of balls (shoot)

-  F = Return the love to sender (parry)

I recommend patting them reddies on the head! Have some fun...
